property.name: Produce new fighters on old carriers
Move existing fighters to new carriers

Allow Movement From Contested To Contested
Allow Movement From Contested To Player Owned
Allow Movement From Contested To Allied Owned
Allow Movement From Contested To Enemy Owned
Allow Movement From Contested To Territory With Own Units
Units Can Be Destroyed Instead Of Captured
notes
property.value:
Aggression 1942 Version 1.

*Follows v3 type rules.

*Only 1 battle rounds.

*Units have 1 upkeep and movement costs.

*Factory and aaGuns are destroyed when captured.

*Victory is achieved by controlling 5 capitals.

*Balance hasn't extensively tested yet. Still in progres.

by Navalland
